channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Genesis Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Genesis Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-2761|2024-08-01T19:25:41.441Z -- unknown -- genesis%20blocks
item.description: The Genesis Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.3 does not properly escape data input provided to some of its blocks, allowing using with at least contributor privileges to conduct Stored XSS attacks.

item.description: The Genesis Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.3 does not properly escape data input provided to some of its blocks, allowing using with at least contributor privileges to conduct Stored XSS attacks.
